lines.text: Lock, I have great plans for you.
Well, Steve, what do you want me to do?
Oh now, Steve, there you go, I...
We're both going out to the Lazy R. Sit in the sun all day and see who can spit the farthest.
What, may I ask, is the Lazy R?
A cow outfit I own about fifty miles out.
A ranch. You know, lots of ground with sky over it.
I think we've met the head man.
Yeah, he's very smooth on the outside...
Do you reckon he's one of them "Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Lock?"
[while Gene got directions to the bad guys hideout over the phone, Smiley transcribed the conversation]
I got every word. Now look, you go to the, yeah, turn right, yeah, over to the, I see, I got it, thanks. You know if we follow this, we're lost before we even get started.
